de-DE: 17.8: Das neueste Update an der WooCommerce-Mobil-App! Als Alternative zur WP.com-E-Mail-Anmeldung kannst du dich nun auf mit Jetpack verbundenen Websites mit deinen Website-Anmeldedaten anmelden. AuÃŸerdem werden Produktlisten nun sofort aktualisiert. Die Lagerbestandsverwaltung ist dank der neuen Funktion zum Massenupdate des Lagerbestands nun einfacher als je zuvor. Du kannst Bestellungen nun direkt in den Papierkorb verschieben. Zudem wurde die Bestellerstellung fÃ¼r Tablets optimiert! Viel SpaÃŸ ğŸ’œ

id: 17.8: Temukan pembaruan terkini aplikasi seluler WooCommerce! Kini, Anda dapat login dengan lancar menggunakan kredensial situs Anda di situs yang terhubung Jetpack, sebagai alternatif dari login email WP.com. Segarkan daftar produk secara instan. Pengelolaan inventaris juga makin mudah berkat fitur pembaruan status stok massal yang baru. Agar makin praktis, pesanan kini dapat dipindahkan langsung ke tempat sampah. Terakhir, kami mengoptimalkan alur pembuatan pesanan untuk tablet! Selamat mencoba ğŸ’œ
it-IT: 17.8: Scopri il nostro ultimo aggiornamento dell'app WooCommerce per dispositivi mobili. Ora, accedi in modo semplice con le credenziali del sito su siti connessi a Jetpack, come alternativa al login con email WP.com. Scopri l'aggiornamento immediato della lista dei prodotti. Inoltre, la gestione dell'inventario Ã¨ piÃ¹ semplice che mai con la nostra nuova funzione di aggiornamento in blocco dello stato delle scorte. Per una maggiore comoditÃ , ora puoi spostare gli ordini direttamente nel cestino. Ultimo ma non meno importante, abbiamo ottimizzato il flusso di creazione degli ordini per i tablet! Buon divertimento ğŸ’œ

nl-NL: 17.8: Welkom bij de nieuwste update voor onze mobiele WooCommerce-app! Now, seamlessly log in with your site credentials on Jetpack-connected sites, as an alternative to WP.com email login. Experience instant refreshing of product list. Plus, managing your inventory is easier than ever with our new bulk stock status update feature. For added convenience, you can now move orders directly to trash. Last but not least, we optimised the order creation flow for tablet devices! Geniet ervan!

en-US: 17.8: Discover our latest update to your WooCommerce mobile app! Now, seamlessly log in with your site credentials on Jetpack-connected sites, as an alternative to WP.com email login. Experience instant refreshing of product list. Plus, managing your inventory is easier than ever with our new bulk stock status update feature. For added convenience, you can now move orders directly to trash. Last but not least, we optimised the order creation flow for tablet devices! Enjoy ğŸ’œ
